g41163.quarto.model

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • g41163.quarto.model.Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the current stock of playable Piece objects
    Author:
    Adrian Torres

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stock()
      Constructor of the Stock class, initializes the pieces array with 16 possible combinations of color, filling, shape and size attributes for a Piece

        Constructor of the Stock class, initializes the pieces array with 16 possible combinations of color, filling, shape and size attributes for a Piece

    • Method Detail

      • takePiece

        public Piece takePiece(int i)
                throws QuartoException
        Takes the number i piece from the pieces list
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the piece to be taken
        Returns:
        the piece at the i index of the pieces list
        Throws:
        QuartoException - if argument i is not between 0 and 16 (excluded)

      • takePiece

        public Piece takePiece()
        Takes the first piece out of the stock (for testing purposes)
        Returns:
        the first piece (index 0) of the instance's pieces ArrayList

      • size

        public int size()
        Checks the current amount of playable pieces
        Returns:
        a number representing the amount of playable pieces

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if there are any more playable pieces
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the pieces list is empty

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string that lists all the current pieces in the stock.
